mapper.select: SELECT TR.REPLY_CONTENT ,TE.EMP_NAME FROM tbl_reply TR JOIN tbl_employee TE ON (TR.EMP_CODE = TE.EMP_CODE) JOIN tbl_board TB ON (TR.BOARD_NO = TB.BOARD_NO) WHERE TB.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY TR.REPLY_WRITE_DATE
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_reply WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT P.REPLY_CONTENT ,P.EMP_NAME FROM (SELECT TR.REPLY_CONTENT ,TE.EMP_NAME FROM tbl_reply TR JOIN tbl_employee TE ON (TR.EMP_CODE = TE.EMP_CODE) JOIN tbl_board TB ON (TR.BOARD_NO = TB.BOARD_NO) WHERE TB.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY TR.REPLY_WRITE_DATE DESC ) P LIMIT ${ startRow -1 }, #{ endRow }
